data.title: Hebron Christian Academy
data.text:
Join Our Team

We appreciate your interest in Hebron Christian Academy. We are blessed with vibrant and qualified faculty and staff that are dedicated to helping develop life-long learners that are prepared to serve as Christian leaders and be a transforming influence in a rapidly changing world. Our lower school, middle school, and high school educators challenge, understand, support, and love our students. They desire to provide an environment where each student can thrive and realize their potential.

Currently, we are seeking applicants for positions for the 2024-2025 school year. Interested candidates should submit a personnel application along with a resume.

Any interested applicants can apply directly through the open job postings listed below.

Once an application is received, it is made available to the hiring manager for consideration. When there is a fit for a position, the hiring manager will contact the applicant directly for an interview.

“HCA is a great community of professionals who strive to offer best practice in the classroom, accountability and encouragement to one another, and sound Biblical integration into every content area with the desire of helping students reach their full potential. It is a blessing to be able to pray with and for one another and to know that we are striving together for the good of our students and the community. My passion is for teaching and learning and to advance God's kingdom, and here at HCA, I get to bring them together every single day!”
